event.title: passed away peacefully at Willow Valley Retirement Communities in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, on March 5, 2009

data.event: Martha Uhrich Peiffer, age 95, passed away peacefully at Willow Valley Retirement Communities in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, on March 5, 2009.
Together they shared a life of Christian ministry that spanned seven decades.

event.title: was born in Grantville, Pennsylvania, on November 4, 1913

data.event: Martha was born in Grantville, Pennsylvania, on November 4, 1913.

The daughter of D. Valentine and L. Stella Hetrick Uhrich, she was one of five siblings, Helen Uhrich, Ruth Shreffler and Daniel Uhrich, now deceased, and Elenore Barnhart, who resides in Elizabethtown, Pennsylvania.

event.title: became a registered nurse in the state of Pennsylvania in 1939

data.event: Martha attended school in Grantville, and became a registered nurse in the state of Pennsylvania in 1939.
Harold and Martha were married on June 15, 1940, at St. Paulâ€™s United Brethren Church in Elizabethtown.
